name: NetHeads
description:
Take down the volleyball champs in this goofy take on a beach classic.  Or, play local multiplayer to prove that you're the king of the net!

Player 1: WASD

Player 2: Arrow keys

Programming done by myself (@wjhollyart) and art by my good friend Gabe (@gpriske).

This was made as part of IconOven, a collaboration between Gabe and myself.  We have both decided to upload the games here on itch for posterity's sake.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
